website_summaries.verdict: A good product of high quality, although the hardware isn't as great as it could be. Owners love the light it emits.
pros: Emits bright light that resembles sunlight
cons: The included hardware is not as hardy as the light itself

customer_reviews.title: Great product if it last as long as they claim
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly bright. Great product if it last as long as they claim. The pic is two of them in my 24' x 30' carport
customer_reviews.author: Bailemdon

customer_reviews.title: Junk lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought six of these lights for my daughter and son in law’s garage. After two months two takes five to ten minutes to come on and two others only half of the light comes on. Update; after four months only one light out of the six still works. Two will not come on at all, and three only half will come on. I haven’t heard back from the company yet!
customer_reviews.author: tommy t.

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased when I received all four lights in great condition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these lights, and read the reviews about the packaging after I placed the order. I was very pleased when I received all four lights in great condition. The packaging issues seem to have been fully addressed. Each were individually packaged in a sturdy box with paper padded around the light which was packaged in its own production box. As far as the lights themselves they worked perfectly. They were very bright and the hanging brackets and chains worked great. I am actually going to purchase another light for another area
customer_reviews.author: Dawnell

customer_reviews.title: The fixture produces bands of light and bands of shadow.
customer_reviews.text: The fixture produces bands of light and bands of shadow, apparently because the tube in which the LEDs are contained is clear, and does not disperse the different bands of light. It is OK for some types of work but not for a task like sewing or drafting, where the different bands of light are distracting and make it impossible to see color accurately. The seller refused to replace the light unless I promised, before seeing the replacement light, to give it a five-star review .
customer_reviews.author: MRB

customer_reviews.title: Check for operation before getting excited about them
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two lights. One doesn't work at all. The other light didn't work either, then one side came to life after lots of attempts of turning on and off but the other side still does not work . Going through the process of returning both now. Glad it works well for others, but not for me. Also, no biggie but you might want to consider using your own drywall hangers. The ones they include with the lights are about as cheap as they come.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lights worked for a month. Packaging was just fine in my case but ...
customer_reviews.text: Lights worked for a month. Packaging was just fine in my case but the lights themselves were bent like pretzels! It sure appears to me as if they were actually put into the box that way since they were double boxed and the packaging looked completely undamaged. They worked so I reckon I'll keep them, but they look horrible. Update - after less than a dozen on/off cycles over a month or so the light has now quit working. I'm downgrading my rating from two stars to one and I'm very disappointed. There is no excuse for all of the reports of damaged packaging or damaged lights (see other reviews). I consider this item to be bordering on a scam.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: On Your Own
customer_reviews.text: No plug as described. Requires hard wiring or wiring in plug. Shows hanging chains on photo. They are not included. No pull chain as well. Very disappointed given reviews and photos shown. Will have to go to local hardware store and purchase pull chain, plug and hanging hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur R. Telfeian

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last summer, and procrastinated doing the wiring it required until the days got short and I needed the light. Alas, after I installed a new outlet in the garage ceiling, I learned the shop light didn't work. Fortunately, I was able to pick up a comparable light, at a competitive price, at my local Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Jovial

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these lights to put over my son's desk for homework. It worked great until bed time. The light didn't turn all the way off. I had to unplug it so he could sleep. I got a replacement light, and it did the same thing. Great price, and now I know why. Spend another $10 and get one the turns on and off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: It did what I wanted and more.
customer_reviews.text: Not being really mechanically inclined, I would've liked a little bit more detail in the instructions and certainly larger print. It wasn't hard to install once I figured it out. I was a bit stunned by how bright it was. I like it! It was replacing an old lighting system with those long bulbs. To my eye, it has to put out more than double the light in brightness. The only thing that surprised me with you cannot replace the bulbs. But with a life expectancy they published, it will outlive me.
customer_reviews.author: David Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the Flourescent twin bulb light over my workbench. Very bright and I don’t worry any longer about accidentally breaking a bulb and showering myself with Mercury vapor. The LED bulbs are mercury free and start up instantly. I read some posts where garage door openers failed to operate when these LED lights were on but I do not have that issue. I have found no interference at all.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Only half of the LED's lit up!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a good review if the light fixture actually worked. However, when I plugged it into the outlet and pulled on the pull cord I only had half of the LED's lighting up. I imagine that there was a loose wire somewhere. None the less it's a hassle to have to unpackage it and then find out it doesn't work and then have to repackage it to return it. You would think that the manufacturer would perform a test prior to shipping the lights but it doesn't seem as so.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and perfect for our basement
customer_reviews.text: This light is lightweight, bright and very easy to install. It is however, disposable, there is no way to replace the bulb, but it comes with a 5 year warranty, so for the cost I think they are more than worth it, even if it has to be replaced in 5 years. Plus, in my opinion, it was easier to hang this light than it is to replace bulbs in our old one. I ordered 4 of these, which each stand alone. The packing wasn’t very good, but I only had to send one back because it arrived bend during shipping. It was quickly replaced. I would highly recommend this light.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6-pack of these and one stopped transmitting power to the rest of the string. Getting a replacement on their dime was such a darn hassle that I bit the bullet and bought a new one, exact model and size. Well, it’s not the same size so I couldn’t use the existing mounting screws I put in so I had to put more holes in the ceiling. I really hope these things last because my experience thus far has been a headache.
customer_reviews.author: PPPPCCCC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: The light is bright and so far is working out great in the garage. I do notice some cons. Not big enough to effect the ratings but worth noting for other potential buyers. First off it make a humming noise when in use not loud but noticeable when working underneath it. The pull chain is super short so if your flush mounting on an average height ceilings 8-9ft you will need to buy an extension. Not all the hardware is included. If you plan on using the chains to hang the light (this is the method I used) you will need two eye hooks.
customer_reviews.author: ABIT

customer_reviews.title: The lights are bare and very bright.  Very hard on the eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Guess we were not really looking at these lights..... They are bare and so bright that they hurt your eyes as you look into the shop. Ha! Just do't look up, I guess. We would not buy these again if aesthetics come into play.. As for "light weight"....they are too light weight for the space. Needed something a bit more sturdy and substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Really BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for a traditional two tube florescent shop light. No more tubes to replace. No chance of a tube shattering and dropping glass on whatever is under it. Easily daisy chained. Very light weight. Came with hanging chains and clips/hardware. The lone point of concern: Possibly the worst packaging I've ever seen! Packed in a cardboard sleeve with a fold over tab that wasn't even taped down. I've no idea how the two lights I ordered arrived intact with the hardware still inside! Weird.
customer_reviews.author: R. Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to install light
customer_reviews.text: Wow this light was incredibly easy to install. Just pop a few small nails in where the chains will hook onto and plug in the power cable and you’re set. I expected some more difficulty but it really was that easy. No noticeable electrical noise and the lights are bright and uniform Only con I can think of is that the packaging is very tight with the light itself so any damage to the package will translate to the light housing. Mine had very slight bending but a few seconds with my thumbs fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kokorone

customer_reviews.title: My garage is so much brighter
customer_reviews.text: When my overhead fluorescent fixture burned out I couldn't find anything that didn't require hard wiring into my electrical system. Not being an electrician and not wanting to pay for the installation of a new overhead fixture I searched Amazon for the solution. This product is better, brighter, and easier to install than any fixture I've installed in the past. The light reaches into every corner of my garage - I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Experienced Bluetooth Owner

customer_reviews.title: Not super bright
customer_reviews.text: Like that they interconnect so i could place two in a single area with only one plug. The brightness is not what I was hoping for from an led light. I placed 2 of them in a 12x20 shop and did not light it up enough for my liking. It was go enough to see but working on wood projects i like plenty of like. Luckily i was able to relocate them into a small shed, and they worked well. If you have a large open area don't think they will light up enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brad T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright,  but missing Chains and S Hooks
customer_reviews.text: Cant say much about instruction as the Chains and S Hooks were missing from the box. The package was torn and tattered. I had to go to home depot to buy chains and s hooks to install it. Once installed. I noticed a dull light (Glow) emitting from both bulbs. Not sure if that is normal. It seems nice and bright though Update: I attached the light to a switched Extension Cord, and the glow went away. Turned it on and off a few times and still no glow. Maybe the switch is defective?
customer_reviews.author: T. Brock

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper, easier and brighter than fluorescent
customer_reviews.text: 5+ stars. Happily, the day is here where the LED is all around better. This kit installs instantly. It ends the hassle of disposing and replacing toxic fluorescent tubes. Light, sturdy, bright, cheap, low power. You will never want to touch a fluorescent kit again after using this. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Iopas

customer_reviews.title: factory box has improved to 3-ply cardboard (thin)
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights, bought my first one to replace two old fluorescent, it did the job. next one was to get rid of shadow by workbench. Third light brightened up my table saw. All work fine, no shipping damage. They are shaped like they have a ballast but they do not, just sheet metal on top. Just punch a hole thru it anywhere you want and light is hung. It's so bright in my garage that I'm surprised the neighbors dont complain about the light from the skylights!
customer_reviews.author: WARD

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I waited
customer_reviews.text: After years of tolerating flickering, half "burnt" bulbs and trying to find the right fluorescent bulbs for my ballasts, I am sorry I waited. These easily hung from the same hooks as original fluorescent fixtures, making an effortless installation. Cords easily reached original a/c plugs. Much brighter, no flicker, or turn-on delay. The bulbs should last longer then I will. What's not to like other than waiting.
customer_reviews.author: GSXR

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had this light for almost 4 months and I've had issues already. One side of the Leds don't work and occasionally both side don't work. It looks like the side that doesn't work is getting power but won't turn on all the way. Installed this in a utility closet so it doesn't get used much. I have no idea why it's not working. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Fine for a hanging installation, but very difficult to mount flush to ceiling
customer_reviews.text: We (three capable adults, in turns!) have been struggling to hang this from screws so that the fixture is flush with ceiling for about 90 minutes. It's a super miserable experience. It definitely takes two people at a time and even then is quite hard. The light itself is basic and fine, providing a bright light, but the flushmount design is extremely poor. It requires exact placement of two screws, and then blindly attaching to the screw holes at the back. We ended up drilling screws directly through the fixture into the ceiling, and that's working OK, but wish we could get those 90 minutes back!!
customer_reviews.author: JKR

customer_reviews.title: For the cost, you can't beat these shop lights.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these lights a few years ago and had a problem with it lighting in cold weather. Hykolity replaced it with a newer model and it has been great. I bought another one a few weeks ago and its doing good so far. A true test will be this winter. I even like this model better than my other one because the bulbs are frosted type instead of glaring clear.
customer_reviews.author: Zilla

customer_reviews.title: I have 15 of these hanging in a 60x40 shop ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 15 of these hanging in a 60x40 shop at 11' 6" from floor and they more than cover that area with bright white light! I expected with a qty of 15+ that there would be some defective units however they all worked perfectly and I chain them in groups of 3 using their extra 120v outlet located on the opposite side from the power cord. The Picture below is with only 2 lights installed so you can imagine with 15 my shop is quite bright.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: You cannot go wrong with these
customer_reviews.text: How did we ever get along without LED lights in the past? These things are light, easy to install. The light out of these things is fabulous. I have now bought about eight of these things and put them everywhere. You can plug 4 in together. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Should have been 5 star BUT....
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice smaller shop light. Decent brightness and it’s nice that you can connect multiples BUT why not make the power cord a little longer and include longer hanging chains not to mention a 3 inch pull cord. This should have been a 5 star rating but manufacturers cut a few pennies out of their product. Be prepared with more chains and extension cord. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great Basement Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This fixture has two L.E.D. tubes, light weight, easy to mount, and bright light output. The possible problem is that the L.E.D. tubes can not be replaced, however, the tube life is typically greater then 50,000 hours so in normal house use this will not be a problem. The fixture lamp voltage controller does not hum or generate any electronic noise. This is a lower cost fixture that is great for high light output.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor - after minutes of ownership
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for? I had this set up, on the ceiling and powered on in a few minutes. Cool it works. I walk away for 5 minutes. When I came back it was flickering like a fluorescent light. What the heck? LEDs shouldn't do that at all! One reviewer said I does that for a while when first turned on. Not sure why. I hope it stops. Since I already threw the box away, it looks like I'm stuck with it for awhile. Hope it doesn't drive me (further) into insanity.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  A Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: As a grow light
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to use as grow lights for seedlings. The 5000K means they should be close to the sunlight spectrum. They worked fine until the plants got large enough to transplant; I did notice that older plants were not as dark green as they would have been in real sunlight. I kept the seedlings about 9"-12" from the lights. As an inexpensive and energy efficient alternative to true grow lights, these are fine. I am going to try herbs and greens with these over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: W Olson

customer_reviews.title: nice bright lights for the workroom
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bright lights for the workroom. They are a bit lightweight in construction, but in way that's good because they are fairly light. Since they don't put out a lot of heat, you really don't need a hefty metal frame. These plug into an outlet. I may hardwire them into the dying fixture they will replace, or I may just get their larger fixture and be done with it. My packages arrived mostly intact. A few tears, but no damage. But they definitely were lucky this time. Pretty flimsy. Now I wish they made a interior floor lamp.
customer_reviews.author: wtxnitz

customer_reviews.title: MEGA BRIGHT, light and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I replaced 2 20-something year old aluminum shop lights in my car garage with 2 of these LEDs and was very impressed by how bright my garage is now. They were very easy to install, because these lights are so light weight, 2 screws was all that I needed. 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate if you need garage or shop lighting!
customer_reviews.text: Class act! I can't recall my last 5 star rating. A pet peeve of mine is reviewers complimenting packaging without yet evaluating the product. Wow, these are attractive, bright and perfect for my shop application. That being said, the packaging on these lightweight and potentially easily damaged units was impressive. A nice shipping box containing the quality illustrated actual product box. No damage anywhere. Obviously, a company that takes pride in their products. Will certainly purchase again when additional lighting needed.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Updated - Vendor is amazing, and the light is great!
customer_reviews.text: Update: The vendor, Hykolity, contacted me shortly after my original review was posted, and set an additional light to correct for the original unit. They were fantastic, and the light itself is great. I ordered an additional two, and none had the repeated issue with the socket. Five star service from the vendor! Original review: The female socket for daisy chaining was ground off on a corner, leaving the electrical contact exposed, and the socket itself was mangled into position on the single unit I ordered. The lights are bright, and I didn't plan on putting any more in series so not bothering to return
customer_reviews.author: Christian J Hafele

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight materials, long shipping time too. Might be ok in the garage ceiling if it isn't used to roughly. But as a over work bench light I will have to wait and see. Pull switch seems like it works well and it did come with all necessary mounting hardware, its overpriced at $30. As I write this it is now $10 off. Probably worth that.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Super Bright
customer_reviews.text: Needed a shop light above my work bench at my new house. This one fit the bill perfectly. Super bright and light weight. It couldn’t have been any easier to install. Just hang it and plug it in. It would be hard to beat the price on this light and the quality appears to be very good. Overall I’m quite pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: J R KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is a good shop light.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light. It installed easily, though I had to splice in an extra foot of wire to make it reach the plug-in. It is bright and because it is LED it won't cost a lot if I forget to turn it off. It doesn't leave a lot of shadows which is a problem with some lights. I am really thinking about buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: 173rd Airborne Purple Heart

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light
customer_reviews.text: I had fluorescents in my garage before and I couldn't take them any longer. I hate changing the bulbs and how they sometimes will not turn on when they are dying. This unit not only weighs about 1/10th of what the other unit weighs but the light is better and looks just like my older unit. I will buy again for my washroom when those bulbs go.
customer_reviews.author: Strkeout

customer_reviews.title: Dingy yellow light stripes...
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Lights up the room nicely, HOWEVER, it gets three stars because of the odd yellow stripes it "shines" on everything. I guess it's not really yellow, but like a dirty light look, striped. Hard to explain, but if you hold up a white shirt anywhere in the room you're lighting up, you can clearly see what I'm talking about...and you can also see it on all surfaces. Not a huge deal, as the light works, it's just that i think the way these were made results in this striping effect. It's really odd, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Bright and cheery
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace my very old lights in the garage. Wow. Love these lights. They are nice and bright but without that cold, harsh fluorescent look. Sounds corny but they feel like sunshine. Only thing is that these come with lamps preinstalled. So, of a lamp burns out you cant replace just the lamp. I hope they last a lonnnggg time.
customer_reviews.author: JDub

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light.  Basically bright LEDs in a plastic tube that looks like a std fluorescent light
customer_reviews.text: Summary. I bought 2 for my garage workshop, and liked them so much I bought 2 more to replace the fluorescent lights in my downstairs work shop. The tubes are plastic, so I don't break them, and they diffuse the light so there is no shadow being case on the work (smooth, even light). They are game changer when it comes to lighting a work surface.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and bright
customer_reviews.text: Our basement was really dim, with only single-bulb fixtures. It made doing the laundry down there an unpleasant affair--it was often hard to see how clean or dirty anything was until it made it upstairs. With one of these fixtures in place (plugged into the old single-bulb socket using an adapter, so they'd still work with the wall switch) it was like being transported to a different room. While it didn't make don't laundry pleasant, it did make it less unpleasant!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Riemer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic tubes with string of LED  inside.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. The bulb is a plastic glazed tube with a ribbon string of LED lights inside. Tons of GLARE. But they work well, no delay when turning on and are a cost effective approach for replacing fluorescent tubes. Not sure how they work ibelow 40F.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: These are plug in units, Use two to replace an eight foot unit.
customer_reviews.text: I installed ceiling outlets where my old hard wiring came through the ceiling for my old 8 foot fluorescent units and hung the new LED's and plugged in. Still operate from the original switch. I can isolate units by pulling the chain on units I don't want lit up. When all eight units are on my garage is BRIGHT. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Wm. R Henninger

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good condition and work well
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people complained about the company's packing on here, but they must have listened because mine arrived in decent boxes and fully intact. It installed easily with the chains (didn't try attaching directly to the ceiling because mine are textured) and is extremely bright. I am using them in a garage setting so I cannot confirm the reviews that say the light is streaky. My garage is bright as day now and Much nicer to work in.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Kleinhans

customer_reviews.title: You'd better have a low ceiling!
customer_reviews.text: The chains for hanging are only 12" long and the pull cord for the light is only 8" long. It might work for a room with an 8' ceiling and a fairly tall person to reach the pull cord. But to make it work in my garage, I had to purchase 36" chains to replace the ones it comes with. Also the product info doesn't tell you that the bulbs are not replaceable. Since they are LED, they will last a long time, but then you have to buy a whole new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Orca

customer_reviews.title: Good lights, but missing hardware!
customer_reviews.text: They do ship these in thru original box as mentioned by other reviews. Luckily both of mine arrived without damage. However, one of them did not come with any hanging hardware. They simply did not put the hardware pack in the packaging or fell out before shipping. Fortunately I was going to screw the fixture directly to the studs. So I don't need the linked chain. But I can see this would be a problem for others. Stats were taken off because of this. Other than packaging issues, the light is bright! Two of them lit up my work area very nicely and eliminate shadows
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and well made
customer_reviews.text: Unlike previous reviews the box was strong and protected the lamp well The fixture was light weight and installed in about two minutes The bulbs were already in place and the chains were easy to insert. The bright light was perfect for my shop.
customer_reviews.author: PETER Z.

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I replace an old florescent two bulb light and this is a nice upgrade. More light, less energy used, weighs less and was easy to install. Definitely recommend if those things matter to you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine today. Only lasted for a week. The light stopped working and so did the outlet to expand other lights
customer_reviews.author: brian kirschbaum

customer_reviews.title: Very poor packaging material, arrived damaged and did not work
customer_reviews.text: The packaged arrived damaged and the lamp was dented. The unit is light weight and the mounting hardware looks OK. I was not able to test anything as the lamp did not work. They need to redesign the packaging and have better quality control. Thank god for prime. Easy to return. I have asked for an exchange so I will see on the next one.
customer_reviews.author: JohnLikes2Travel

customer_reviews.title: VERY CRISP BRIGHT LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: This unit is one of the lightest units I have ever installed. It is super easy to install, you literally just hang it from eye hooks etc and plug it in. No humming or buzzing and the light is very crisp super daylight. You can also daisy chain up to 8 units I believe. Great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, very bright, right price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to illuminate my hobby area and that it does. This took me 5 mins to install and is plug and play ready right out of the box.. Good product, I'm very happy with it. The only downside I can see is it does not have a dimmer but for under $30 this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Althea A. Morin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy to install. Just would been nice have longer chains to hang from the ceiling and to turn on and off. I went to buy longer chains and pull chain. Also I should of bought 2 instead of one. But when I went to lumber big box store I found one the same size and brightness. It was way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: jerry bruce

customer_reviews.title: I love these shop lights.
customer_reviews.text: They are very lightweight and easy to install. I had old incandescent light fixtures in my old garage, so instead of having to rewire those I just used a plug adapter I cold screw into the light socket. These plug right into that and then to each other. Instead of two lightbulbs in my old garage I now have 4 of these, which has transformed the garage from a dim cave to a place you can actually work in. For the money you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Qvox

customer_reviews.title: Brighter and less heat than comparable florescent fixture
customer_reviews.text: The ballast died on my florescent light fixture so I replaced it with this. This is brighter and has very little heat. Florescent bulbs/fixtures are not really hot, but in my air conditioned shop, I like fewer heat sources. Plugs in to a regular wall socket and has a socket on the end so you can daisy chain multiple fixtures. I will be buying more as the inevitable death of the ballast in my other fixtures occur.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: It has fixed bulbs... can't change them
customer_reviews.text: The light looks nice, plenty of light, easy to install. But if I had known that the lights were not replaceable, I would Never have bought it... so, it is my fault for not checking. Fluorescent bulbs don't last that long, and if you can't replace them... not a good deal, if you use the light a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.

customer_reviews.title: very bright,  work great,  but stay lit when turned off
customer_reviews.text: Brighter than all my T32 and T40 fixtures. Only problem is stays lit (dim, but still lit) if you turn off using pull chain. Apparently this is normal for LED lamps, but it's first time You will not have this problem if you are on switched power and don't use the pull chain. I have attached photos of the lamp turned off w/ pull chain. It stays somewhat lit. Does anybody else have this issue?
customer_reviews.author: Camper

customer_reviews.title: Would've given a better rating, but...
customer_reviews.text: First let me start by saying the light is very bright in my laundry room in the basement. The laundry room is a small space so it's perfect! However, the box had a hold when it was delivered. When I took the light out of the box, the frame was bent. I also didnt realize I can't change the light bulbs unless I'm missing something. There wasn't a phone number on the instructions. All and all, the fixture works fine for now.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. They are on the 12 ft ceiling of my garage. Super easy to mount, they are so lightweight I surface mounted them to my metal ceiling with one metal roofing/siding screw on each end right through the shell of the light into the metal ceiling (not hitting a truss or stud) I have 10 of these, they all worked out of the box and are still working. I might not use these in a low ceiling (7 -8 ft) due the sparkle effect of the open LED's but they're great for what I'm doing.
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoplight!
customer_reviews.text: Of course time will tell how good this thing really is but if it's longevity is anything like the other LED light bulbs I've installed throughout my place, this thing should hold up for a really long time. Piece of cake to install. Simply attach the chain link support, hang it on the ceiling and plug it in. Didn't even have to install the bulbs. They were already installed. Piece of cake!
customer_reviews.author: Techman

customer_reviews.title: Good led shop light
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law just updated his garage lights from fluorescent to led and I couldn't believe how much brighter they were. So I went on Amazon looking for a couple to put in my garage. After checking the reviews I decided on the Hykolity led's and ordered two of them. One reason was the ability to plug them into each other (chain them together) which makes for a cleaner install. They have been working great and are very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these lights more than once. I like the color and brightness they put out. Only issue is the circuit noise they create. I can't listen to my favorite FM station with these lights turned on. I've tried filters in the electrical lines to the radio, but haven't found a workable solution as yet. For the price I think the lights are a good buy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Able

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, very bright, no negatives at all
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light. The two lighting tubes are frosted, so you get a nice, diffused, even light. You can not see the individual LEDs, which is good. The light is very bright and it is not bluish, which suits my taste. I plan to buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: AceFlyer

customer_reviews.title: Bright, light weight and nice look.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good deal. Very bright, light weight and nice industrial design. Little on the flimsy side, but came at a very cheap price. Good deal overall. Like the fact that I can connect multiples, but no need for that at the time. Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jrod The Gr8

customer_reviews.title: Very white and bright light!
customer_reviews.text: This really lights up a room! I got it to replace an old overhead florescent and the difference is amazing! Glad I got it
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Feltz

customer_reviews.title: Light good. Hanging hardware not so good
customer_reviews.text: I’m satisfied with the light completely. However, I did have problems hanging it. It has short chain to hang with. Fortunately I had kept the hanging hardware from another light ( that is not in stock anymore) and used it to install. Very bright. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mike Addington

customer_reviews.title: Light and nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement to an old school florescent hanging lamp for our laundry room. I wish I'd replaced it years ago! This thing is super light and casts a large amount of light. However, since the bulbs have a temperature of 5000K (in the "sunlight" range), the light it casts is nice and easy on the eyes. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mason

customer_reviews.title: Super bright!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an ancient fluorescent unit over a work bench with a failed ballast. It hung very easily in the previous spot. The pull-chain switch is smooth doesn't require a hard pull. And the light is super bright! I will be getting 2 more to replace my other work lights, even though they aren't failing.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Failing LED light
customer_reviews.text: Light does not work on day one. Only one out of two rows of LED cane once powered up. Eventually the second row also came on and light was working normally for couple months. Then it failed again and remained defective.
customer_reviews.author: Wousa

customer_reviews.title: Great if they would stay on but they fail after ...
customer_reviews.text: Great if they would stay on but they fail after a day. returned one set that failed, now will be returning two more Nice and bright when they work, but can't depend on them as they fail after a day /quick. Can't take a chance for the 3rd time to buy these from Amazon Hassel to return these. will be buying local. Really wish I could get a set that worked.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews might be of a previous item
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about this item. Other reviews made me think there was no diffusion coating over the LEDs, which would give a "Striped" look with light and shadows. That's not true. The LED strips have a diffusion cover. This item looks and acts like an old-school shoplight. It is nice and bright, with two different options for mounting. I was pleased and as long as it continues to perform, I would have no problem buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Minor gripe of short pull chain.
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought a few different of these led shop lights from various makers. All seem about the same if you tick in the same watt range. Happy with this brand. Other than it does not come with a pull chain extension like the previous ones I have purchased. Not a big deal just thought I would mention it incase you want to mount it high.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Bright and light, but easier with two people to mount!
customer_reviews.text: A very light and very bright light. I found it a tad difficult to align preformed mounting spots with measured and marked mounting holes, especially working alone. Finally screwed holes in the fixture and used the fixture as my template for setting mounting screws. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Roger  Smithson

customer_reviews.title: Nice light! If I need another one, I would buy this one again.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this light fixture, lightweight, easy to install, instant ON with no delay. Exactly what we were expecting, no surprises. Perfect shoplight. If I need another one, I would buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: TZ2DSR

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I rarely do reviews, but this light deserves it. If you've got basic construction skills you'll have no issues putting the light up, and the brightness is well worth the 30 bucks. At least in my 10x16 shed. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stams99

customer_reviews.title: Bright light, short power cord.
customer_reviews.text: Great light for the price. Nice and bright. Only complain I have is with the power cord. Too short (maybe 2-3 ft), especially if you can't mount next to an outlet. Recommend buying a separate 2 prong extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Very small pull cord
customer_reviews.text: I like the brightness that it brings to the garage, but the pull chain is too short. Just got it and have not figured out a way to add to it. Until then, I am using a small step ladder. Would be fine if mounted above a work area, but not on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Jed

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering with an uncooperative fluorescent light fixture in my garage for months. Half the time it wouldn't go on, other times it would flicker. I adjusted the bulbs a hundred times. Finally I sprung for this LED fixture. What a difference! The light goes on immediately every time. I also never realized how yellow the old light was until I got this fixture. Its 5000k light is pure white. I liked it so much, I ordered another one to replace the second fluorescent fixture in my garage. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: kmitch

customer_reviews.title: LED light bulb is bright and perfect in my garage
customer_reviews.text: Received it in 3-4 days. Packaged in a box comparable to a bike box, with a smaller box inside of the bigger one. I've read the complaints about the packaging, but none here. Took less than 30 mins to set up and hang over my work bench. LED light bulb is bright and perfect in my garage. Yes, the LED bulb comes with the unit and the entire light is super light. I have a temporary work space in my apartment garage and this provides plenty of light. I plan on ordering a second light which can connect to the one already hanging over my bench, to position over my motorcycle. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bigwilly

customer_reviews.title: useless Light
customer_reviews.text: This light worked for less than 2 months, and quit. The electrician said it was useless. Don't buy this product. Don't review this product until several months when the total worth of this light really comes to light!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bubba101

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and bright
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light distribution and quality. The value for the price is exceptional. Two items that I would change, these are so lightweight that the weight of the cord alone makes them angle or turn and they only come with the option to hang by the provided chains not directly mount to the ceiling or surface. But overall a good value
customer_reviews.author: TG08

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding LED shop light!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding LED shop light. It's very well made, very light weight, super bright and only consumes 40 watts of power. Comes complete not only with hanging chains but also high quality loop bracket for hanging it from the ceiling. They seem to have also resolved the issue with the unit arriving damaged as mine arrived double boxed and arrived undamaged. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: 5000K LED SHOP LITE
customer_reviews.text: reading your add about this item---it dose not say anything about you can not re move the bulbs--you have to buy a new unit complete-- SO THIS MEANS 30 DAYS FROM NOW THE UNIT IS NOT WORKING-HAVE TO BUY ANOTHER--THIS SHOULD BE LISTED ON THE SITE
customer_reviews.author: Edward Evans

customer_reviews.title: Bright, lightweight, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these LED lights for over my workbench. Installed easily in just a couple minutes. Chain and hooks are included for hanging. Each light operates on its own pull chain even when chained together.
customer_reviews.author: S. O.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what i was hoping for. Very bright in a compact and easy to install housing. Not much else to say, definitely a great purchase. I have it in an 8'x8' shed and way more than enough light.
customer_reviews.author: mojo2090

customer_reviews.title: Missing installation hardware.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesomely bright and work really well. The only problem I had is that the chains were different lengths and I didn't get enough clips to install them. I purchased two lights and three of the four chains they hang from were different lengths. I also did not receive the necessary clips to hang the light in one of the packages. I purchased some simple hardware at the local store and got it all to work, the clips allow you to adjust for the different length chains but it is quite a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a month
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't even last a month before it wait working. I am very disappointed and will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Woods

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was great. Removed from the box to try it out
customer_reviews.text: Received the light. Packaging was great. Removed from the box to try it out. Turned on and was extremely bright, I was very pleased. Got it hung up where I wanted, turned it on and nothing. Took it down and plugged it in elsewhere, nothing. Little frustrated, tried an hour or so later and turned on with ease. Hung it up again and nothing. Pretty disappointed, I really loved how bright it was but now doesn't turn on. Edit: Returned the light as it didn't turn on. Tried another one and it's great. I love the light output and have had zero issues. Definitely happy I purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Packaging completely shredded
customer_reviews.text: Packaging completely shredded upon arrival and all the hardware is missing... they do turn on but not yet sure if I can install them without hardware.
customer_reviews.author: srobertson

customer_reviews.title: Abit on cheap side
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged slightly on canopy installed it anyway. The fixture is on cheap side we'll see if last John B.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: 5000K is 5,000,000 whatever?
customer_reviews.text: Very good light and easy to install. Needs longer chain. I tink the Chinese need to learn English, 'cause I refuse to learn Chinese It's a nice thing to be able to see clearly, no doubt
customer_reviews.author: Greenrush relief

customer_reviews.title: Visibly brighter!
customer_reviews.text: This shoplight is VISIBLY brighter than the old fluorescent model it replaced. I am so intrigued I may actually buy a second one. As long as the LEDs deliver what the manufacturer promises - like a gazillion hours before this thing burns out - I have no complaints. On the contrary, I can really recommend this fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Luke

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These lights made a huge improvement to our garage. Highly, highly recommended. Easy to install. All 4 lights arrived in perfect condition. Update: One of the four fixtures has decided to only work at random intervals. No lights, one bank, both banks. Cussing at the fixture did not fix it. Thinking of hiring a Voodoo priest to probably curse the light. <g>
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the bulbs is still faintly lit even when the switch is off
customer_reviews.text: One of the bulbs is still faintly lit even when the switch is off. I imagine that this must cause it to use a small amount of electricty even when it is off. I just unplug it when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Furtek

customer_reviews.title: Emits very strong radio frequency interference.
customer_reviews.text: I installed one of these in my workshop. The install was easy and the light works perfectly. When I try to listen to FM or AM broadcast radio in the shop the static generated by the light fixture makes reception almost imopssible. Ham radio operators beware.
customer_reviews.author: EDGAR ALEXANDER

customer_reviews.title: Great LED Shop Light  lights up the whole room.
customer_reviews.text: I love this LED shop light. It is so bright. I actually use it to brighten up my living room which is dark- I place it facing up-- behind the couch and it illuminates the entire wall behind the couch and makes the living room look so much brighter. I used to do the same thing with fluorescent shop lights but this LED shop light is far superior. It does not get hot and so placing it behind the couch facing upwards to light up the living room creates no hazard at all. I love the light
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre J.Callahan

product_meta.title: 5000K LED Shop Light Linkable, 4FT Daylight 42W LED Ceiling Lights for Garages, Workshops, Basements, Hanging or FlushMount, with Plug and Pull Chain, 4200lm, ETL- 1 Pack
feature_bullets: ✔ Super Bright - This LED Shop Light provides 4200 Lumens at 5000K Daylight White. That is a staggering LED Efficiency of 110 lm/w!
✔ Durable - Pull cord on/off switch included. Made up of composite aluminum for a long lasting LED Light fixture.
✔ Wide Application - Widely installed in garages, workshops, workbench areas, storage areas, warehouses, basements, equipment rooms, etc.
✔ Easy Installation - Uses plug connection to link up multiple lamps. Hanging hardware included for an easy installation.
✔ 5 Year Warranty -5 Year Warranty means we got you covered! Contact us if any issue arises.

specifications.Special Features: Shatter resistant, Instant On, Easy to Install
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,698 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
